'''''A Guide to Playing The Hobbit''''' is a book by [[David Elkan]] with the aim of helping and guiding players of [[The Hobbit (1982 video game)|the video game adaptation of ''The Hobbit'']] through the game.<ref>[http://books.google.com/books?id=ynFQAQAACAAJ&dq=isbn:0861611616&hl=nl&ei=fL06ToB8iIb7BqHJgOQN&sa=X&oi=book_result&ct=result&resnum=1&ved=0CCkQ6AEwAA A Guide to Playing the Hobbit], [http://books.google.com/books?hl=en Google Books] (accessed at [[4 August]], [[2011]])</ref><ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseekid.cgi?id=2000171 Guide to Playing The Hobbit, A] at [[wikipedia:World of Spectrum|World of Spectrum]] (accessed at [[4 August]], [[2011]])</ref>
